statements: SELECT id, location, traffic_flow, congestion_level FROM traffic_monitoring;
SELECT location, traffic_flow, id, congestion_level FROM traffic_monitoring;
SELECT congestion_level, location, id, traffic_flow FROM traffic_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE congestion_level='High';
SELECT id, location FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE traffic_flow > 100;
SELECT * FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE congestion_level = 'High';
SELECT id, location, traffic_flow FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE traffic_flow > 100 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE congestion_level = 'Low' AND traffic_flow BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE traffic_flow < 50 OR congestion_level = 'Medium' AND location LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, location, traffic_flow, congestion_level FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE location IN ('City Center', 'Highway Exit') AND congestion_level <> 'Low' ORDER BY traffic_flow DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_flow;
SELECT location, flow_level FROM traffic_flow WHERE flow_level > 50;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM traffic_flow WHERE congestion_level = 3;
SELECT id, location, flow_level, congestion_level FROM traffic_flow ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, map_type, zoom_level FROM map_settings WHERE zoom_level < 10;
SELECT id, location, flow_level, congestion_level FROM traffic_flow WHERE flow_level > 50 ORDER BY congestion_level DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, location, flow_level FROM traffic_flow WHERE congestion_level < 3 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT id, location, flow_level FROM traffic_flow WHERE congestion_level > 2 AND flow_level BETWEEN 30 AND 60
SELECT * FROM traffic_flow WHERE location LIKE '%highway%' ORDER BY flow_level DESC
SELECT id, map_type, zoom_level FROM map_settings WHERE show_traffic = TRUE
SELECT * FROM traffic_monitoring ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, location, traffic_level FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE traffic_level > 5;
SELECT id, location, traffic_level, congestion_level FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE congestion_level < 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT camera_id, location, camera_type FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT event_id, event_type, reported_timestamp FROM traffic_events ORDER BY reported_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_monitoring ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, traffic_level FROM traffic_monitoring WHERE traffic_level > 5 AND congestion_level < 3;
SELECT event_id, event_type, reported_timestamp FROM traffic_events WHERE event_type='Accident';
SELECT location, camera_type, status FROM traffic_cameras WHERE location LIKE 'Downtown%';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM traffic_events WHERE event_type='Construction' ORDER BY reported_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficFlow;
SELECT location_id, congestion_level FROM TrafficFlow WHERE congestion_level > 2;
SELECT location_name FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT map_name, map_data FROM Maps WHERE map_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT id, location_id, congestion_level, timestamp FROM TrafficFlow WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM TrafficFlow JOIN Locations ON TrafficFlow.location_id = Locations.location_id WHERE location_name = 'New York';
SELECT id, sensor_type FROM TrafficFlow JOIN Sensors ON TrafficFlow.location_id = Sensors.location_id WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT location_name, congestion_level FROM Locations JOIN TrafficFlow ON Locations.location_id = TrafficFlow.location_id WHERE congestion_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT map_id, map_name, map_data FROM Maps WHERE map_data ->> 'city' = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM TrafficCameras;
SELECT location, longitude, latitude FROM TrafficCameras WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT overlay_name, overlay_data FROM MapOverlay WHERE overlay_id = 1;
SELECT camera_id, flow_rate FROM TrafficFlow ORDER BY flow_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficCameras;
SELECT camera_id, location, longitude, latitude FROM TrafficCameras WHERE location LIKE 'Downtown%';
SELECT traffic.camera_id, traffic.location, traffic.longitude, incidents.incident_type FROM TrafficCameras AS traffic JOIN TrafficIncidents AS incidents ON traffic.camera_id = incidents.camera_id;
SELECT traffic.camera_id, traffic.location, flow.flow_rate, flow.timestamp FROM TrafficCameras AS traffic JOIN TrafficFlow AS flow ON traffic.camera_id = flow.camera_id ORDER BY flow.timestamp DESC;

SELECT congestion.camera_id, congestion.congestion_level, overlay.overlay_name, overlay.overlay_data FROM CongestionLevels AS congestion JOIN MapOverlay AS overlay ON congestion.camera_id = overlay.overlay_id WHERE congestion.congestion_level = 'High';
